page.title: 03A 10-YEAR OLD'S DAY, CROYDON
page.content: On Saturday I get up at 7 am and get dressed, and brush my teeth. I make my breakfast - bacon and egg - and drink some milk. At 9 am I do my home- work for Chinese school (I go to ordin- ary school during the week). I help my mum to clean the house, and later my dad goes to work. I wait for my uncle to collect my mum, sister, little brother and myself to take us to my cousin's restaurant where we help. At 12 noon I have lunch. We use a pair of chopsticks and we have a bowl of rice and Chinese food. When we have finished my cousin takes my sister, little brother and me to their house and we play snooker. At 5 pm my uncle takes us back to the restaurant, then after dinner he takes us home.
